title: [BUG]metadata query can not run on GPU on databricks
body:
**Describe the bug**
SerializeFromObjectExec and ExternalMapToCatalyst can not run on GPU in case delta table write

**Steps/Code to reproduce bug**
from pyspark.sql.types import *
from pyspark.sql import SparkSession
spark = SparkSession.builder.appName('delta_write').getOrCreate()
spark.conf.set("spark.rapids.sql.enabled","true")
spark.conf.set('spark.rapids.sql.exec.CollectLimitExec','true')
spark.conf.set('spark.rapids.sql.format.delta.write.enabled','true')
spark.sql(f"DROP TABLE IF EXISTS default.delta_range")
data = spark.range(1,5)
data.write.format("delta").mode("overwrite").saveAsTable('delta_range')
new_data = spark.range(5,1000)
new_data.write.format("delta").mode("append").saveAsTable('delta_range')
df=spark.table('delta_range')
df.collect()
df.show()
df.explain()

**Expected behavior**
metadata query exec could run on GPU

**Environment details (please complete the following information)**
 AWS databricks 10.4 LTS ML (includes Apache Spark 3.2.1, GPU, Scala 2.12)

**Additional context**

*Exec <ProjectExec> will run on GPU
  *Expression <Alias> null AS stats#102 will run on GPU
  ! <SerializeFromObjectExec> cannot run on GPU because not all expressions can be replaced; GPU does not currently support the operator class org.apache.spark.sql.execution.SerializeFromObjectExec
    @Expression <Alias> staticinvoke(class org.apache.spark.unsafe.types.UTF8String, StringType, fromString, knownnotnull(assertnotnull(input[0, com.databricks.sql.transaction.tahoe.actions.AddFile, true])).path, true, false, true) AS path#91 could run on GPU
      ! <StaticInvoke> staticinvoke(class org.apache.spark.unsafe.types.UTF8String, StringType, fromString, knownnotnull(assertnotnull(input[0, com.databricks.sql.transaction.tahoe.actions.AddFile, true])).path, true, false, true) cannot run on GPU because GPU does not currently support the operator class org.apache.spark.sql.catalyst.expressions.objects.StaticInvoke
        ! <Invoke> knownnotnull(assertnotnull(input[0, com.databricks.sql.transaction.tahoe.actions.AddFile, true])).path cannot run on GPU because GPU does not currently support the operator class org.apache.spark.sql.catalyst.expressions.objects.Invoke
          !Expression <KnownNotNull> knownnotnull(assertnotnull(input[0, com.databricks.sql.transaction.tahoe.actions.AddFile, true])) cannot run on GPU because expression KnownNotNull knownnotnull(assertnotnull(input[0, com.databricks.sql.transaction.tahoe.actions.AddFile, true])) produces an unsupported type ObjectType(class com.databricks.sql.transaction.tahoe.actions.AddFile); input expression AssertNotNull assertnotnull(input[0, com.databricks.sql.transaction.tahoe.actions.AddFile, true]) (ObjectType(class com.databricks.sql.transaction.tahoe.actions.AddFile) is not supported)
            ! <AssertNotNull> assertnotnull(input[0, com.databricks.sql.transaction.tahoe.actions.AddFile, true]) cannot run on GPU because GPU does not currently support the operator class org.apache.spark.sql.catalyst.expressions.objects.AssertNotNull
              ! <BoundReference> input[0, com.databricks.sql.transaction.tahoe.actions.AddFile, true] cannot run on GPU because GPU does not currently support the operator class org.apache.spark.sql.catalyst.expressions.BoundReference
    @Expression <Alias> externalmaptocatalyst(lambdavariable(ExternalMapToCatalyst_key, ObjectType(class java.lang.String), true, -1), staticinvoke(class org.apache.spark.unsafe.types.UTF8String, StringType, fromString, lambdavariable(ExternalMapToCatalyst_key, ObjectType(class java.lang.String), true, -1), true, false, true), lambdavariable(ExternalMapToCatalyst_value, ObjectType(class java.lang.String), true, -2), staticinvoke(class org.apache.spark.unsafe.types.UTF8String, StringType, fromString, lambdavariable(ExternalMapToCatalyst_value, ObjectType(class java.lang.String), true, -2), true, false, true), knownnotnull(assertnotnull(input[0, com.databricks.sql.transaction.tahoe.actions.AddFile, true])).partitionValues) AS partitionValues#92 could run on GPU
      ! <ExternalMapToCatalyst> externalmaptocatalyst(lambdavariable(ExternalMapToCatalyst_key, ObjectType(class java.lang.String), true, -1), staticinvoke(class org.apache.spark.unsafe.types.UTF8String, StringType, fromString, lambdavariable(ExternalMapToCatalyst_key, ObjectType(class java.lang.String), true, -1), true, false, true), lambdavariable(ExternalMapToCatalyst_value, ObjectType(class java.lang.String), true, -2), staticinvoke(class org.apache.spark.unsafe.types.UTF8String, StringType, fromString, lambdavariable(ExternalMapToCatalyst_value, ObjectType(class java.lang.String), true, -2), true, false, true), knownnotnull(assertnotnull(input[0, com.databricks.sql.transaction.tahoe.actions.AddFile, true])).partitionValues) cannot run on GPU because GPU does not currently support the operator class org.apache.spark.sql.catalyst.expressions.objects.ExternalMapToCatalyst
        ! <LambdaVariable> lambdavariable(ExternalMapToCatalyst_key, ObjectType(class java.lang.String), true, -1) cannot run on GPU because GPU does not currently support the operator class org.apache.spark.sql.catalyst.expressions.objects.LambdaVariable
        ! <StaticInvoke> staticinvoke(class org.apache.spark.unsafe.types.UTF8String, StringType, fromString, lambdavariable(ExternalMapToCatalyst_key, ObjectType(class java.lang.String), true, -1), true, false, true) cannot run on GPU because GPU does not currently support the operator class org.apache.spark.sql.catalyst.expressions.objects.StaticInvoke
          ! <LambdaVariable> lambdavariable(ExternalMapToCatalyst_key, ObjectType(class java.lang.String), true, -1) cannot run on GPU because GPU does not currently support the operator class org.apache.spark.sql.catalyst.expressions.objects.LambdaVariable
        ! <LambdaVariable> lambdavariable(ExternalMapToCatalyst_value, ObjectType(class java.lang.String), true, -2) cannot run on GPU because GPU does not currently support the operator class org.apache.spark.sql.catalyst.expressions.objects.LambdaVariable
